comments.body:
Just a small hint here, the ``==`` is not necessary :)
Not necessary to change, but you can just write
```suggestion
    - pytest-runner  4.4
```
Oh that works too? Good to know, looms simpler that way. Thanks!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +25,29 @@    # version of pytest-runner. Need to make pytest-runner a dependency only for python setup.py test
    # and then remove this from requirements|host in the recipe
    - pytest-runner ==4.4
  run:
    - python
